examples.example: 经过一载的努力奋斗，他终于实现了自己的目标。

translate.english: After a year of hard work, he finally achieved his goal.

examples.example: 这一载的时光匆匆而过，留下了许多美好的回忆。

translate.english: The time of this year passed quickly, leaving many wonderful memories.

examples.example: 度过这充实的一载，我的生活变得更加丰富多彩。

translate.english: After spending this fulfilling year, my life has become more rich and colorful.
